TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultPropertiesToSend extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定在向消息队列发送 实例以外的对象时所使用的默认属性值。

span.span: Specifies the default property values that will be used when sending objects other than instances to a message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以对发送到的消息设置所选属性的默认值。You can set default values on selected properties for messages sent to a . 用于指定在将实例以外的对象发送到队列时发送的消息的默认属性值, 例如, 传递到代码片段`myMessageQueue.Send("hello")`中的方法的字符串自变量。 is used to specify default property values of the message being sent when objects other than instances are sent to a queue, for example, the string argument passed into the method in the code fragment, `myMessageQueue.Send("hello")`. 类在中具有与相同的、具有相同命名的属性, 这些属性在专门发送实例时提供值。 The class has corresponding, identically named properties to those in that provide the values when sending a instance specifically. 即使已为队列指定 , 也会将对象发送到该队列, 这将导致具有相同命名属性的值覆盖队列的值。Even if you have specified for a queue, sending a object to that queue will cause the values for the identically named properties to override the queue's values. 未显式设置的属性默认为构造函数指定的值。Properties that you do not set explicitly default to the values specified by the constructor, . 有关实例的初始属性值的列表, 请参见构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用消息的优先级来确定要为消息发送的默认属性。The following code example uses the priority of a message to determine default properties to send for the message. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CPP/mqdefaultpropertiestosend.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CS/mqdefaultpropertiestosend.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend/VB/mqdefaultpropertiestosend.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以创建的新实例, 以定义要与发送到不属于类型的队列的对象关联的默认属性值。You can create a new instance of to define default property values to associate with objects sent to a queue that are not of type . 使用对象时, 将为 你创建一个实例, 并将其与的成员相关联。 When working with objects, a instance is created for you and associated with the member of the . 有两种方法可以定义要发送的队列的默认属性, 如下面C#的代码所示。There are two ways to define a queue's default properties to send, as shown in the following C# code. 可以设置此实例的值, 并将其与队列的属性关联:You can set values for this instance of and associate it with the queue's property: ``` DefaultPropertiesToSend myDefaultProperties = new DefaultPropertiesToSend(); // Set default values for the properties. myDefaultProperties.Label = "myLabel"; myDefaultProperties.Recoverable = false; ... myMessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend = myDefaultProperties; myMessageQueue.Send("hello"); ``` 或者, 可以直接将值分配给实例的属性:Or, you can individually assign values to the instance's property directly: ``` myMessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend.Label = "myLabel"; myMessageQueue.DefaultPropertiesToSend.Recoverable = false; ... myMessageQueue.Send("hello"); ``` 如果选择其中的第二个选项, 则无需显式调用构造函数。If you choose the second of these options, you do not need to call the constructor explicitly. 例如, 如果属性的默认值取决于要发送的消息的某些条件, 则您可能需要创建的实例。You might want to create instances of , for example, if the properties' default values depend on some criterion of the message being sent. 可以创建多个实例, 并在将消息发送到队列之前将一个实例分配给队列的属性。You can create multiple instances and assign one to the queue's property before sending the message to the queue. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`AcknowledgeTypes.None`| ||`null`| ||00| ||`true`| ||`EncryptionAlgorithm.RC2`| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`HashAlgorithm.MD5`| ||空字符串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||`MessagePriority.Normal`| ||`false`| ||`null`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`null`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes AcknowledgeType { System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes get(); void set(System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes value); };
member this.AcknowledgeType : System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置返回给发送应用程序的确认消息的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of acknowledgement message to be returned to the sending application.
One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 此值用于确定系统在管理队列中传递的确认消息的类型以及向发送应用程序返回确认消息的时间。

span.span: This value is used to determine the type of acknowledgment messages the system posts in the administration queue and when acknowledgments are returned to the sending application.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定要返回给发送应用程序的确认消息的类型。The property specifies the type of acknowledgment messages to return to the sending application. 例如, 将属性设置为在消息到达其目标、检索时或超时是否阻止消息到达目标队列或从目标队列检索消息时请求通知。For example, set the property to request notification when a message reaches its destination, when it is retrieved, or whether a time-out has prevented the message from reaching or being retrieved from the destination queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ AdministrationQueue { System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ get(); void set(System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ value); };
member this.AdministrationQueue : System.Messaging.MessageQueue with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置队列，该队列接收由消息队列生成的确认消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the queue that receives acknowledgement messages generated by Message Queuing.

value.span: ，指定用于系统生成的确认消息的管理队列。

span.span: The that specifies the administration queue used for system-generated acknowledgment messages.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性中指定的队列可以是任何非事务性队列。The queue specified in the property can be any non-transactional queue. 发送到管理队列的确认消息可以指示原始消息是否已到达其目标队列, 以及是否已从队列中删除该消息。The acknowledgment messages sent to the administration queue can indicate whether or not the original message reached its destination queue, and whether or not it was removed from the queue. 当属性具有以外的任何值`None`时, 发送应用程序必须指定要用作管理队列的队列。 When the property has any value other than `None`, the sending application must specify the queue to be used as the administration queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AppSpecific { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.AppSpecific : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序特定的附加信息。

span.span: Gets or sets additional, application-specific information.
Information specific to the application.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含附加的应用程序特定的信息, 这些信息可用于组织不同类型的消息, 例如, 使用应用程序特定的索引。The property contains additional, application-specific information that can be used to organize different types of messages, for example, using application-specific indexes. 应用程序负责解释信息。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret information. 如果可能, 消息数据应包含在消息的正文中, 而不是包含在属性中。Where possible, message data should be included in the body of the message rather than in the property. 使用外部队列时, 请使用属性指定非消息队列消息属性。When working with foreign queues, use the property to specify non-Message Queuing message properties. 与一样, 应用程序负责了解属性的内容。As with , it is the responsibility of the application to understand the content of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AttachSenderId { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AttachSenderId : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示发送方 ID 是否应附在消息中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the sender ID should be attached to the message.

value.span: 如果发送方 ID 应附在消息中，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if sender ID should be attached to the message; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发件人 ID 是表示发送用户的标识符的字节数组。The sender ID is an array of bytes that represents the identifier of the sending user. 发件人 ID 由消息队列设置, 接收队列管理器使用该 ID 来验证发送方是否有权访问队列。The sender ID is set by Message Queuing and is used by the receiving Queue Manager to verify whether the sender has access rights to a queue. 仅当消息到达目标队列时已通过身份验证, 才可信任发送方 ID。The sender ID is only trustworthy if the message was authenticated when it reached the destination queue. 如果未将发送方 ID 附加到消息, 则发送应用程序会指示消息队列在将消息发送到目标队列时不应验证消息的发送方。When the sender ID is not attached to the message, the sending application is indicating that Message Queuing should not validate the message's sender when the message is sent to the destination queue. 如果目标队列只接受经过身份验证的消息, 或者或`false`为, 则在消息到达队列时将拒绝该消息。If the destination queue only accepts authenticated messages, and either or is `false`, the message will be rejected when it reaches the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::EncryptionAlgorithm EncryptionAlgorithm { System::Messaging::EncryptionAlgorithm get(); void set(System::Messaging::EncryptionAlgorithm value); };
member this.EncryptionAlgorithm : System.Messaging.EncryptionAlgorithm with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于加密私有消息体的加密算法。

span.span: Gets or sets the encryption algorithm used to encrypt the body of a private message.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果消息是私有的, 则在发送消息之前对其进行加密, 并在收到消息时解密。If a message is private, it is encrypted before it is sent and is decrypted when it is received. 属性指定用于对专用消息的消息正文进行加密的算法。The property specifies the algorithm used to encrypt the message body of a private message. 队列可能要求对传入消息进行加密。A queue can require that incoming messages be encrypted. 如果将非加密 (非专用) 消息发送到只接受私有消息的队列, 或将私有消息发送到只接受非私有消息的队列, 则该消息将被队列拒绝。If a non-encrypted (non-private) message is sent to a queue that only accepts private messages, or if a private message is sent to a queue that only accepts non-private messages, the message is rejected by the queue. 如果消息被拒绝, 则发送应用程序可以请求向发送应用程序返回否定确认消息。The sending application can request a negative acknowledgment message be returned to the sending application if a message was rejected.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Extension { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };
member this.Extension : byte[] with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.ComponentModel.Design.ArrayEditor, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.ComponentModel.Design.ArrayEditor, System.Design, Version=1.0.5000.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=1.0.5000.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.ComponentModel.Design.ArrayEditor, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置与消息关联的附加信息。

span.span: Gets or sets additional information associated with the message.

value.span: 字节数组，提供与消息关联的、应用程序定义的附加信息。

span.span: An array of bytes that provides additional, application-defined information associated with the message.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的数组。

span.span: The default is a zero-length array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供与消息关联的应用程序定义的附加信息, 例如大型二进制对象。The property provides for additional application-defined information that is associated with the message, such as a large binary object. 接收应用程序负责解释的内容。It is the responsibility of the receiving application to interpret the contents of the . 如果可能, 消息数据应包含在消息的正文中, 而不是在扩展中。Where possible, message data should be included in the body of the message rather than in the extension. 使用外部队列时, 请使用属性指定非消息队列消息属性。When working with foreign queues, use the property to specify non-Message Queuing message properties. 在非 Microsoft 消息队列的队列系统中存在一个外部队列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft 消息队列通过连接器应用程序与此类队列通信。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::HashAlgorithm HashAlgorithm { System::Messaging::HashAlgorithm get(); void set(System::Messaging::HashAlgorithm value); };
member this.HashAlgorithm : System.Messaging.HashAlgorithm with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在验证消息或为消息创建数字签名时使用的哈希算法。

span.span: Gets or sets the hashing algorithm used when authenticating messages or creating a digital signature for a message.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识在对消息进行身份验证或为消息创建数字签名时消息队列使用的哈希算法。The property identifies the hashing algorithm Message Queuing uses when authenticating messages or when creating a digital signature for a message. 在为消息创建数字签名时, 源计算机上的消息队列将使用哈希算法。Message Queuing on the source computer uses the hashing algorithm when creating a digital signature for a message. 然后, 目标队列管理器使用相同的哈希算法在收到消息时对消息进行身份验证。The target Queue Manager then uses the same hashing algorithm to authenticate the message when it is received. 由于 MD5 发生冲突, Microsoft 建议 SHA256。Due to collision problems with MD5, Microsoft recommends SHA256.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Label { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Label : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序定义的、描述消息的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets an application-defined string that describes the message.
The label of the message.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如, 消息标签可用于显示目的, 或根据标签值有选择地处理消息。A message label can be used for display purposes, for example, or to selectively process messages based on the label value. 消息标签的最大长度为249个 Unicode 字符。The maximum length for a message label is 249 Unicode characters. 此标签在消息中不必是唯一的。The label does not need to be unique across messages. 消息队列和消息标签代表一个应用程序定义的值, 可帮助在用户可读的字词中标识队列或消息。Message queue and message labels represent an application-defined value that can help to identify the queue or message in human-readable terms. 应用程序负责解释标签内容;它们对于消息队列应用程序没有内部意义。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret label contents; they have no intrinsic meaning to the Message Queuing application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::MessagePriority Priority { System::Messaging::MessagePriority get(); void set(System::Messaging::MessagePriority value); };
member this.Priority : System.Messaging.MessagePriority with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置消息优先级，用于确定消息在队列中的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the message priority, which is used to determine where the message is placed in the queue.

value.span: 表示非事务性消息优先级的 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that represents the priority level of a non-transactional message.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会影响消息队列在消息处理过程中处理消息的方式, 以及消息到达其目标时消息在队列中的放置位置。The property affects how Message Queuing handles the message while it is en route, as well as where the message is placed in the queue when it reaches its destination. 优先级较高的消息在路由过程中给予首选项, 并在队列前面插入。Higher priority messages are given preference during routing and inserted toward the front of the queue. 而具有相同优先级的消息则会按照到达的先后时间插入到队列中。Messages with the same priority are placed in the queue according to their arrival time. 只能为非事务性消息设置消息优先级。Message priority can only be set meaningfully for non-transactional messages. 事务性消息的优先级自动设置为`Lowest`, 从而导致忽略事务消息优先级。The priority for transactional messages is automatically set to `Lowest`, which causes transactional message priority to be ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Recoverable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Recoverable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在出现计算机故障或网络问题时是否保证传递消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message is guaranteed to be delivered in the event of a computer failure or network problem.

value.span: 如果通过在消息传递过程中将消息保存到磁盘上来保证消息的传递，则为 ；如果不能保证传递，则为 。

span.span: if the message is guaranteed delivery by saving it to disk while en route; if delivery is not assured.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否保证消息的传递, 即使在消息发送到目标队列时计算机发生崩溃。The property indicates whether delivery of a message is guaranteed, even if a computer crashes while the message is en route to the destination queue. 如果保证消息的传递, 则会在路由中的每个步骤本地存储消息, 直到将消息成功转发到下一台计算机。If delivery of a message is guaranteed, the message is stored locally at every step along the route until the message is successfully forwarded to the next computer. 设置为`true` on可能会影响吞吐量。Setting to `true` on could affect the throughput. 如果消息是事务性的, 则无论是否设置为`true`, 消息队列都会自动将消息视为可恢复消息。If the message is transactional, Message Queuing automatically treats the message as recoverable, regardless of whether is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ ResponseQueue { System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ get(); void set(System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ value); };
member this.ResponseQueue : System.Messaging.MessageQueue with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置接收应用程序生成的响应消息的队列。

span.span: Gets or sets the queue that receives application-generated response messages.

value.span: 应用程序生成的响应消息所返回到的 。

span.span: The to which application-generated response messages are returned.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识接收应用程序生成的响应消息的队列, 该消息由接收应用程序返回到发送应用程序。The property identifies the queue that receives application-generated response messages that are returned to the sending application by the receiving application. 当应用程序发送消息时, 发送应用程序会指定响应队列。Response queues are specified by the sending application when the application sends its messages. 任何可用队列均可指定为响应队列。Any available queue can be specified as a response queue. 返回到响应队列的消息是应用程序特定的。Messages returned to the response queue are application-specific. 应用程序必须定义消息中的内容, 以及收到消息时要执行的操作。The application must define what is in the messages as well as what is to be done when a message is received.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan TimeToBeReceived { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.TimeToBeReceived : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置从目标队列中检索消息的时间限制。

span.span: Gets or sets the time limit for the message to be retrieved from the destination queue.

value.span: 从目标队列中接收已发送消息的总时间（以秒计）。

span.span: The total time, in seconds, for a sent message to be received from the destination queue.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定从目标队列接收发送的消息的总时间 (以秒为单位)。The property specifies the total time in seconds for a sent message to be received from the destination queue. 此时间限制包括进入目标队列所用的时间, 以及应用程序检索消息之前在队列中等待的时间。This time limit includes the time spent getting to the destination queue, plus the time spent waiting in the queue before the message is retrieved by an application. > [!CAUTION] > 使用从属客户端计算机时, 请将客户端计算机上的时钟与运行消息队列的服务器上的时钟同步。When using dependent client computers, synchronize the clock on the client computer with the clock on the server running Message Queuing. 如果两个时钟不同步, 则当不是时发送消息时, 可能会出现不可预知的行为。If the two clocks are not synchronized, you might see unpredictable behavior when sending messages when is not . 如果从队列中删除消息之前该间隔过期, 则消息队列应用程序将丢弃该消息。If the interval expires before the message is removed from the queue, the Message Queuing application discards the message. 如果消息的属性设置为`true`, 或者如果为`false`, 则将消息发送到死信队列。The message is either sent to the dead-letter queue, if the message's property is set to `true`, or ignored, if is `false`. 如果 小于,则优先。 If is less than , takes precedence. 如果在计时器过期之前未检索到消息, 则可以将消息的属性设置为请求消息队列向发送应用程序发送否定确认消息。The message's property can be set to request that Message Queuing send a negative acknowledgment message back to the sending application if the message is not retrieved before the timer expires. > [!CAUTION] > 如果你指定接收否定确认, 则当的值小于的值时, 将不会收到这些确认。If you have specified to receive negative acknowledgments, you will not receive them when the value of is less than the value of . 当在事务中发送多条消息时, 消息队列将使用第一条消息的属性的值。When several messages are sent in a transaction, Message Queuing uses the value of the first message's property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan TimeToReachQueue { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.TimeToReachQueue : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置消息到达队列的时间限制。

span.span: Gets or sets the time limit for the message to reach the queue.

value.span: 从发送消息的时间算起，消息到达目标队列的时间限制（以秒计）。

span.span: The time limit in seconds for a message to reach the destination queue, from the time the message is sent.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该时间间隔在消息到达其目标之前过期, 则消息队列应用程序将丢弃该消息。If the interval expires before the message reaches its destination, the Message Queuing application discards the message. 如果消息的属性设置为`true`, 或者如果为`false`, 则将消息发送到死信队列。The message is either sent to the dead-letter queue, if the message's property is set to `true`, or ignored, if is `false`. 如果 大于,则优先。 If is greater than , takes precedence. 消息的属性可以设置为请求消息队列向发送应用程序发送否定确认消息 (如果在计时器过期之前消息不会到达)。The message's property can be set to request that Message Queuing send a negative acknowledgment message back to the sending application if the message does not arrive before the timer expires. 如果为0秒, 则当队列正在等待消息时, 消息队列将尝试将消息发送到其目标。If is 0 seconds, Message Queuing tries once to send the message to its destination if the queue is waiting for the message. 如果队列是本地的, 则消息始终到达队列。If the queue is local, the message always reaches the queue. 当在事务中发送多条消息时, 消息队列将使用第一条消息的属性的值。When several messages are sent in a transaction, Message Queuing uses the value of the first message's property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ TransactionStatusQueue { System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ get(); void set(System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ value); };
member this.TransactionStatusQueue : System.Messaging.MessageQueue with get, set

summary.span: 获取源计算机中的事务状态队列。

span.span: Gets the transaction status queue on the source computer.

value.span: 源计算机中的事务状态队列，用于将确认消息发回发送应用程序。

span.span: The transaction status queue on the source computer, which is used for sending acknowledgement messages back to the sending application.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识源计算机上的事务状态队列。The property identifies the transaction status queue on the source computer. 属性由消息队列设置, 在检索发送到外部队列的事务性消息时由连接器应用程序使用。The property is set by Message Queuing, and is used by connector applications when retrieving transactional messages sent to a foreign queue. 在非 Microsoft 消息队列的队列系统中存在一个外部队列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft 消息队列通过连接器应用程序与此类队列通信。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. 连接器应用程序可以使用事务状态队列向发送应用程序发送确认消息。The connector application can use the transaction status queue to send acknowledgment messages back to the sending application. 即使发送应用程序未请求其他确认, 事务状态队列也应该接收这些确认。The transaction status queue should receive these acknowledgments even if the sending application does not request other acknowledgments.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseAuthentication { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseAuthentication : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示发送前是否必须验证消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message must be authenticated before being sent.

value.span: 如果发送应用程序请求对消息进行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the sending application requested authentication for the message; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定是否需要对消息进行身份验证。The property specifies whether the message needs to be authenticated. 如果发送应用程序请求身份验证, 则消息队列会创建数字签名, 并使用它在发送消息时对消息进行签名, 并在收到消息时对消息进行身份验证。If the sending application requests authentication, Message Queuing creates a digital signature and uses it to sign the message when it is sent and to authenticate the message when it is received. 如果将消息发送到只接受经过身份验证的消息的队列, 当设置为 `false`时, 消息到达队列时将被拒绝。If a message is sent to a queue that only accepts authenticated messages, the message will be rejected when it reaches the queue if is set to `false`. 不能查看消息的属性, 并确定消息身份验证是否失败。It is not possible to look at the properties of a message and determine whether a message failed authentication. 身份验证失败的消息将被丢弃, 且不会传递到队列。Messages that fail authentication are discarded and are not delivered to the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseDeadLetterQueue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseDeadLetterQueue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将未能传递的消息的副本发送到死信队列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a copy of the message that could not be delivered should be sent to a dead-letter queue.

value.span: 如果消息传递失败应导致向死信队列发送消息的副本，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if message delivery failure should result in a copy of the message being sent to a dead-letter queue; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并指定 "消息队列" 跟踪消息的方式。 and specify how Message Queuing will track a message. 如果 为`true`, 则在传递失败的情况下 (对于非事务性消息), 消息将发送到无法传递消息的计算机上的非事务性死信队列 (例如, 如果消息计时器已过期)。If is `true`, then in case of delivery failure (for non-transactional messages), the message is sent to the non-transactional dead-letter queue on the computer that could not deliver the message (for example, if a message timer expires). 如果事务消息传递失败, 则会在所有负面和有疑问的情况下将消息发送到源计算机上的事务性死信队列。In the case of delivery failure for transactional messages, the message is sent to the transactional dead-letter queue on the source computer in all negative and in-doubt cases. 如果将消息存储在死信队列中, 则定期清空队列以删除不再需要的消息。When you store messages in a dead-letter queue, empty the queue periodically to remove messages that are no longer needed. 死信队列中存储的消息会根据队列所在计算机的大小配额计数。Messages stored in dead-letter queues count against the size quota for the computer where the queue resides. 计算机配额由管理员设置, 是指分配给计算机上的消息的总大小, 而不只是在单个队列中。The computer quota is set by the administrator and refers to the total size allocated for storing messages on a computer, not just in a single queue. 不创建日志或死信队列。You do not create a journal or dead-letter queue. 这些都是消息队列生成的系统队列。These are both system queues that are generated by Message Queuing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseEncryption { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseEncryption : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使消息成为私有的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to make the message private.

value.span: 要求消息队列加密消息时为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to require Message Queuing to encrypt the message; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果消息是私有的, 则在发送消息并在收到消息时解密。If a message is private, its body is encrypted before it is sent and is decrypted when it is received. 若要发送专用消息, 发送应用程序必须指定使用加密, 并根据需要指定要应用的加密算法。To send a private message, the sending application must specify that encryption be used and, optionally, which encryption algorithm to apply. 发送专用消息时, 应用程序不需要执行消息加密。When sending private messages, it is not necessary that your application perform the message encryption. 当你的应用程序在可访问目录服务的 Microsoft Windows 2000 企业内发送消息时, 消息队列可以为你加密消息正文。Message Queuing can encrypt the message body for you when your application sends messages within a Microsoft Windows 2000 enterprise where there is access to the directory service. 接收专用消息时, 它始终是用于解密消息正文的接收队列管理器。When receiving private messages, it is always the receiving Queue Manager that decrypts the message body.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseJournalQueue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseJournalQueue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在始发计算机的计算机日记中保留消息的副本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a copy of the message should be kept in a machine journal on the originating computer.

value.span: 要求在消息成功地从发件计算机传送到下一步后，将消息的副本保存在发件计算机的计算机日记中时为 ，否则为 。

span.span: to require that a copy of a message be kept in the originating computer's machine journal after it has been successfully transmitted from the originating computer to the next step; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并指定 "消息队列" 跟踪消息的方式。 and specify how Message Queuing will track a message. 如果 为`true`, 则在传输消息的每个步骤中, 将副本保存在原始计算机上的计算机日志中。If is `true`, then at each step that a message is transmitted, a copy is kept in the computer journal on the originating computer. 如果目标队列位于远程计算机上, 则仅将发送的消息复制到日记队列。The sent message will only be copied to the journal queue if the destination queue is on a remote computer. 如果目标在本地计算机上, 则该消息将直接发送到队列;无需执行日记操作的中间步骤。If the destination is on the local computer, the message is sent directly to the queue; there are no intermediate steps to require journaling. 在日志队列中存储消息时, 请定期清空队列以删除不再需要的消息。When you store messages in a journal queue, empty the queue periodically to remove messages that are no longer needed. 日志队列中存储的消息按队列所在的计算机的配额计数 (计算机配额由管理员设置)。Messages stored in journal queues count against the quota for the computer where the queue resides (the computer quota is set by the administrator). 不创建日志或死信队列。You do not create a journal or dead-letter queue. 这些都是消息队列生成的系统队列。These are both system queues that are generated by Message Queuing. 消息和队列均可指定日志记录。Journaling can be specified by both the message and the queue. 如果 为`true`, 则在发送消息时, 会将其发送出去。When is `true`, the message is journaled when it is sent. 如果 为`true`, 则在收到消息时, 将对其进行日记。When is `true`, the message is journaled when it is received.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseTracing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseTracing : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在消息向目标队列移动的过程中跟踪消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to trace a message as it moves toward its destination queue.

value.span: 如果在发往目标队列的过程中，由原始消息产生的每个中间步骤都生成发送给系统报告队列的报告，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if each intermediate step made by the original message en route to the destination queue will generate a report to be sent to the system's report queue; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定在消息到达目标队列时是否跟踪该消息的路由。The property specifies whether to track the route of a message as it moves toward its destination queue. 如果`true`为, 则每次消息通过消息队列路由服务器时, 消息队列生成的报告消息都会发送到报表队列。If `true`, a Message Queuing-generated report message is sent to a report queue each time the message passes through a Message Queuing routing server. 报表队列由源队列管理器指定。The report queue is specified by the source Queue Manager. 报表队列并不限于消息队列生成的报表消息。Report queues are not limited to Message Queuing-generated report messages. 还可以将应用程序生成的消息发送到报表队列。Your application-generated messages can be sent to report queues as well. 使用跟踪涉及到设置 Active Directory 和为消息队列企业指定报表队列。Using tracing involves setting up Active Directory and specifying a report queue for the Message Queuing enterprise. 这些设置由管理员配置。These settings are configured by the administrator.
